title: Quite Underwhelmed by the Zyra update
body:
Her passive is now just another source for seeds.

Her Q shape is weird now, but still does the same shit

W is the same, E is the same, and R is the same.

womp womp.

replies.body: Yeah, she might as well been part of the group of mages with small changes

You forgot the part where they nerfed her base damages and ratios.

"Balanced for support"
Anything is better than her old passive...
